cast.name: 拉斐尔·纳达尔 Rafael Nadal

introduction: See what life is like at the Rafa Nadal Academy by Movistar through some of the most promising tennis players in the world. Live an entire season with eight junior and professional players. Training, tournaments, and education under and Rafa Nadal’s supervision. Accomplishments, failures, injuries, and dreams for which everyone works at the Manacor education and high-performance sports center.
